#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
#define ll long long int
int main()
{
	ll t;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--)
	{
		ll j,n,i,min=1000000001,max=0;
		cin>>n;
		ll a[n];
		
		for(i=0;i<n;i++)
		{
		cin>>a[i];
		if(a[i]>max)
		max=a[i];
		if(a[i]<min)
		min=a[i];
	    }
	    //cout<<max<<min<<endl;
	    if(max-min>=2)
		cout<<"BAD"<<endl;
		else
		cout<<"GOOD"<<endl;
		
	}
	return 0;
}
